name: Showdown of the Dungeon
description:
This game is intended for play on a PC or Mac browser. Please leave us a comment of what you think of this in-development game!

Thank you for playing the alpha version of "Showdown of the Dungeon"! This is an unofficial creation by fans of Outside Xbox and Outside Xtra, based on their DnD roleplaying videos. You can play this game solo or with a party of friends!

Contributors:

Developer - Nate Johnson https://twitter.com/HooliganLabs

Pixel Artist - Brad Rich https://twitter.com/ChiefBradley

Outsidefanstra ( https://twitter.com/outsidefanstra ) and the great supportive community that made this possible, which you can join on discord: https://t.co/5uwx0fg1hb

HeyCee, for streaming the launch tournament of this game. You can watch the recording on his Twitch channel! https://www.twitch.tv/heycee/

And of course, special thanks to the testers - aves rex, burningape, Caitlin, Decem,  omiai, scorpinator, Zellen, and more!
